title: How to Draw a Mario Mushroom

steps.headline: Draw a fat-shaped oval.
steps.description: This will become the face of the mushroom.

steps.headline: Draw the mushroom cap.
steps.description: Spiral a good sized circle around the top of the oval.

steps.headline: Add the spots.
steps.description: Draw two oval shapes against the sides of the cap and a complete circle in the middle.

steps.headline: Add the mushroom's eyes.
steps.description: Insert two thin ovals symmetrical on the face.

text: Draw a fat-shaped oval. This will become the face of the mushroom. Draw the mushroom cap. Spiral a good sized circle around the top of the oval. Add the spots. Draw two oval shapes against the sides of the cap and a complete circle in the middle. Add the mushroom's eyes. Insert two thin ovals symmetrical on the face. Color the mushroom in.
sentences: This will become the face of the mushroom.
Spiral a good sized circle around the top of the oval.
Draw two oval shapes against the sides of the cap and a complete circle in the middle.
Insert two thin ovals symmetrical on the face.
